description: You can configure the CPU limits with control parameters.
name: CPU Limits

quota:cpu_shares.description: Specifies the proportional weighted share for the domain. If this element is omitted, the service defaults to the OS provided defaults. There is no unit for the value; it is a relative measure based on the setting of other VMs. For example, a VM configured with value 2048 gets twice as much CPU time as a VM configured with value 1024.
quota:cpu_shares.title: Quota: CPU Shares
